p: In recent years, tetE is often found in a large horizontal transferable plasmid of Aeromonas which are isolated from farm pond water. In addition, tetE is found to have good interspecies transfer ability. The environmental microbial antioxidant tetracycline plasmids TetA, D, and M can also be transferred horizontally to chicken, pig, and intestinal bacteria [36]. It indicates that tetrandrine has great potential for harm the environment.
